Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal needs. Given its high value and potential impact on your business or lifestyle, I propose an offer of $9,500 for the product. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the substantial benefits it promises to deliver to you. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
